features: Complete Dish Drying Bundle: This bundle combines a high-quality roll-up stainless steel over the sink rack and and soft silicone dish mat that keeps water off the countertop, preventing stagnant water.
Space-Saving and Stylish: The sleek stainless steel sink rack offers a modern touch, adding a minimalist style to your kitchen while saving valuable counter space with your dish drainer.

Versatile and Sturdy: Customers love that our combination dish dying rack system can hold various dishes, bowls, and utensils with ease, thanks to its sturdy construction and large capacity. Easily folds and rolls for storage.

Premium Materials: The silicone drying mat for kitchen counters and foldable dish drying rack are made of high-quality materials such as pure silicone rubber and rust-proof 304 stainless steel, ensuring long-lasting durability
Everything you need to optimize your space: Heat-resistant silicone non-slip kitchen sink mat and rolling metal sink drain - all in one package. Great as an apartment and RV dish rack.
body.description: Introducing the Ultimate Kitchen Drying Solution - our Silicone Dish Mat and Stainless Steel Over the Sink Drying Rack Combination Set! This thoughtfully curated bundle brings together two essential items to revolutionize the way you dry and organize your dishes. Silicone Dish Mat: Our premium silicone dish mat is designed to simplify your dish-drying experience. Its high-quality, food-grade silicone material provides a soft and cushioned surface to protect your delicate dishes from scratches and damage. The mat's ample size allows it to accommodate various dishes, glassware, and utensils, making it a versatile addition to any kitchen. Benefits of the Silicone Dish Mat: Heat Resistant: Our silicone mat can withstand high temperatures, making it suitable for placing hot pots and pans directly on the mat. Quick Water Drainage: The uniquely designed drainage grooves efficiently channel water away from your dishes, ensuring a dry and clean surface. Easy to Clean: The non-porous surface of the silicone mat makes it easy to clean with a simple rinse or wipe. Over the Sink Stainless Steel Rack: Compact yet strong, keeps the drips where they below- in the sink and off your counter! Add drying capacity without cluttering up your counters. Please note dimensions to ensure the rack will fit your sink. Benefits of the Over the Sink Steel Rack: Space-Saving Design: The roll up feature of the drying rack enables easy storage when not in use, perfect for smaller kitchen spaces. Versatile Use: The rack's ample surface area and intelligently designed bars provide ample space for various dishes, and even pots and pans. Made from stainless steel and silicone this rack is sanitary, dishwasher safe, long lasting and plastic-free! A Perfect Combination: Our Silicone Dish Mat and Steel Over the Sink Steel Rack Combination Set is a match made in kitchen heaven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es versátil y fincional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over the sink drying rack
reviews.reviewText: I like my kitchen counters to be clutter free and also have limited space in my cabinets. This over the sink drying rack is the perfect solution to my dilemma. It is a simple design that rolls or folds up into a compact size yet it's durable and strong enough to hold up my largest roasting pan without sagging or warping. Easy to wipe clean and the stainless steel prevents any microorganisms from forming a habitat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Even after I measured it was to short
reviews.reviewText: I loved the idea of this. I saw it measured my sink and thought it would be great. When it came it was like 3 inches to short to sit on the outside of my sink rim. But I have a double sink so I just put on end on the sink rim and the other on the split between the two sinks. I thought this is good because then it is also at an angle so the water will drain off it better. I used it for a few dishes, it is on the small side so it won't fit a ton of dishes, when I put the dishes away the next morning it was still wet and then later in the afternoon it was still wet. Even at an angle the water just sat on it. I guess it just didn't work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller then anticipated
reviews.reviewText: It fits across my sink, but barely. My own fault for not measuring. Make sure you measure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dish Mat
reviews.reviewText: This dish mat has worked really well for my needs. I don't like the other racks out there because they take up space and don't hold enough dishes. I ordered this drying mat and I really just set the part with the metal bars on top of the silicon mat. This makes it possible to get dishes dry and it is just more convenient so that when I don't want anything in that space I roll it back up and put it under the sink. I think that is the beauty of this product it's so versatile. The parts are easy to clean and can just be wiped down if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the RV kitchen
reviews.reviewText: This mat/rack combination is very convenient and easy to store when not in use. It works great in the RV but is a little small for use on our regular kitchen sink. The drying rack is very helpful, heat resistant, and fits over the RV sink perfectly. Both the mat and the rack are easy to clean and can be placed in the dishwasher.Damon M. Tatem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to our kitchen
reviews.reviewText: This rack has been effective piece that we added to our kitchen and every day usage. The drying rack is easy to install and layover the sink. It holds pots, pans, cups with no problem at all. The mat is really easy to wash and can be thrown in the dishwasher which is a big plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Silicone Dish Drying Mat and Roll Up
reviews.reviewText: This combination bundle can be used separately and not just for drying dishes but for colling down hot foods. But the water has no place to flow on the silicone mat, so too much water will just overflow. Please measure your sink before ordering as the mat and rack are not big.
